properties.name: manager.reddit-client-id
properties.description: Reddit client id for the bot.

properties.name: manager.reddit-client-secret
properties.description: Reddit client secret for the bot.

properties.name: manager.user-secret
properties.description: User secret used to validate created accounts and API calls.

properties.name: manager.discord-scheduler-webhook
properties.description: Discord webhook url for scheduler notifications.

properties.name: manager.discord-complaint-webhook
properties.description: Discord webhook url for complaint notifications.

properties.name: manager.discord-rvs-webhook
properties.description: Discord webhook url for raad van state notifications.

properties.name: manager.rvs-secret
properties.description: User secret used to validate accounts for RvS members.

properties.name: manager.do-not-post
properties.description: For testing enviroments, do not post kamerstukken.
